txt.en: 'Why anyone ventures into the Old Forest when they could come here and sit in the garden, I'll never know.'
'Mr. Brandybuck's a real gentlehobbit and keeps all of us folk that work for him in good stead.'
'I keep telling Mr. Brandybuck we ought to plant lilac trees along the path, but he likes his beds of violets.'
'You're not planning to cross the Brandywine on the Ferry, are you? The Brandywine Bridge is safer, if you ask me.'
